column4: Latest;Phnom Penh: 25 Chinese men and 1 women went to the Chinese embassy to ask for intervention after they were cheated by a broker from China and came to work in Sihanoukville. There was no work for them
column5: so now they have no money to buy food.------The incident occurred at 8:15 am on May 11
column7: at the embassy at the embassy in Tuol Tumpong II
column10: staff from the embassy came out and tried to find a solution. They were given  some money for food and told to go back to Sihanoukville.------ ------http://tdnewsasia.com/archives/55216
